model-value.desc: Model of the component defining the current panel's name; If a Number is used, it does not define the panel's index, but rather the panel's name which can also be an Integer; Either use this property (along with a listener for 'update:model-value' event) OR use the v-model directive.

keep-alive.desc: Equivalent to using Vue's native <keep-alive> component on the content
keep-alive.desc_cn: 相当于在内容上使用Vue的原生<keep alive>组件

keep-alive-include.desc: Equivalent to using Vue's native include prop for <keep-alive>; Values must be valid Vue component names
keep-alive-include.desc_cn: 相当于为<keep alive>使用Vue的原生include属性；值必须是有效的Vue组件名称

keep-alive-exclude.desc: Equivalent to using Vue's native exclude prop for <keep-alive>; Values must be valid Vue component names
keep-alive-exclude.desc_cn: 相当于对<keep alive>使用Vue的原生exclude属性；值必须是有效的Vue组件名称

keep-alive-max.desc: Equivalent to using Vue's native max prop for <keep-alive>
keep-alive-max.desc_cn: 相当于对<keep alive>使用Vue的原生max属性

animated.desc: Enable transitions between panel (also see 'transition-prev' and 'transition-next' props)
animated.desc_cn: 启用面板之间的转换（另请参阅“transition-prev”和“'transition-next”属性）

infinite.desc: Makes component appear as infinite (when reaching last panel, next one will become the first one)
infinite.desc_cn: 使组件显示为无限大（当到达最后一个面板时，下一个将成为第一个）

swipeable.desc: Enable swipe events (may interfere with content's touch/mouse events)
swipeable.desc_cn: 启用swipe事件（可能会干扰内容的触摸/鼠标事件）

vertical.desc: Put Stepper in vertical mode (instead of horizontal by default)
vertical.desc_cn: 将步进器置于垂直模式（而不是默认水平模式）

transition-prev.desc: One of Quasar's embedded transitions (has effect only if 'animated' prop is set)
transition-prev.desc_cn: Quasar的一个嵌入式过渡动画（只有设置了“animated”属性才有效）

transition-next.desc: One of Quasar's embedded transitions (has effect only if 'animated' prop is set)
transition-next.desc_cn: uasar的一个嵌入式过渡动画（只有设置了“animated”属性才有效）

dark.desc: Notify the component that the background is a dark color

flat.desc_cn: 应用“平面”设计（无默认阴影）

bordered.desc: Applies a default border to the component
bordered.desc_cn: 将默认边框应用于组件

alternative-labels.desc: Use alternative labels - stacks the icon on top of the label (applies only to horizontal stepper)
alternative-labels.desc_cn: 使用替代标签-将图标堆叠在标签顶部（仅适用于水平步进器）

contracted.desc: Hide header labels on narrow windows
contracted.desc_cn: 在窄窗口上隐藏标题标签

inactive-icon.desc: Icon name following Quasar convention; Make sure you have the icon library installed unless you are using 'img:' prefix; If 'none' (String) is used as value then no icon is rendered (but screen real estate will still be used for it)

inactive-color.desc: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
inactive-color.desc_cn: 组件的颜色，来自 Quasar 调色板的颜色名称

done-icon.desc: Icon name following Quasar convention; If 'none' (String) is used as value, then it will defer to prefix or the regular icon for this state; Make sure you have the icon library installed unless you are using 'img:' prefix

done-color.desc: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
done-color.desc_cn: 组件的颜色，来自 Quasar 调色板的颜色名称

active-icon.desc: Icon name following Quasar convention; If 'none' (String) is used as value, then it will defer to prefix or the regular icon for this state; Make sure you have the icon library installed unless you are using 'img:' prefix

active-color.desc: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
active-color.desc_cn: 组件的颜色，来自 Quasar 调色板的颜色名称

error-icon.desc: Icon name following Quasar convention; If 'none' (String) is used as value, then it will defer to prefix or the regular icon for this state; Make sure you have the icon library installed unless you are using 'img:' prefix

error-color.desc: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
error-color.desc_cn: 组件的颜色，来自 Quasar 调色板的颜色名称

header-class.desc: Class definitions to be attributed to the header
header-class.desc_cn: 作为头部属性的类的定义

navigation.desc: Slot specific for the global navigation; Suggestion: QStepperNavigation
navigation.desc_cn: 全局导航专用插槽；建议：QStepperNavigation

message.desc: Slot specific for putting a message on top of each step (if horizontal stepper) or above steps (if vertical); Suggestion: QBanner, div.q-pa-lg
message.desc_cn: 用于将消息放在每个步骤顶部（如果是水平步进）或步骤上方（如果是垂直）的特定插槽；建议：QBanner，div.q-pa-lg

update:model-value.desc: Emitted when the component changes the model; This event _isn't_ fired if the model is changed externally; Is also used by v-model

before-transition.desc: Emitted before transitioning to a new panel

newVal.desc: Panel name towards transition is going

oldVal.desc: Panel name from which transition is happening

before-transition.desc_cn: 在转换到新面板之前发出

transition.desc: Emitted after component transitioned to a new panel

newVal.desc: Panel name towards transition has occurred

oldVal.desc: Panel name from which transition has happened

transition.desc_cn: 在组件转换到新面板后发出

panelName.desc: Panel's name, which may be a String or Number; Number does not refers to panel index, but to its name, which may be an Integer
panelName.desc_cn: 面板名称，可以是字符串或数字；数字不是指面板索引，而是指其名称，名称可以是整数
